artist: Artist: Nicholas Zinner; Author: Zachary Lipez; Designer: Stacy Wakefield; Publisher: Evil Twin Publications, New York

description: Thread stitched binding, illustration of an unmade, nightstand, and text printed in light blue ink on a marine-like blue paper cover; 32 pp.
medium: Screenprint, color offset lithgraphy, letterpress; bound volume
title: Slept in Beds
